Uses of Class
main.ApplicationController

  • Packages that use ApplicationController 
    Package Description
    game
    Contains all files concerning the gameplay.
    lobby
    Contains all files concerning the game lobby.
    lobby.buttons
    Contains all files concerning the buttons area of the game lobby.
    lobby.endscreen
    Contains all files concerning the post-game screen.
    lobby.menu
    Contains all files concerning the menu area of the game lobby.
    mainmenu
    Contains all files concerning the main menu.
    network.client
    Contains all files concerning clients.

    • Uses of ApplicationController in game

      Methods in game with parameters of type ApplicationController 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void GameController.setApplicationController(ApplicationController applicationController)
      Sets the applicationController that is used to switch between scenes

    • Uses of ApplicationController in lobby

      Methods in lobby with parameters of type ApplicationController 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void LobbyController.setApplicationController(ApplicationController applicationController)
      Sets the controller responsible of managing the different scenes of this application.

    • Uses of ApplicationController in lobby.buttons

      Methods in lobby.buttons with parameters of type ApplicationController 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ButtonsController.setApplicationController(ApplicationController applicationController)
      Sets the ApplicationController which can be accessed by this controller.

      Methods in lobby.menu with parameters of type ApplicationController 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
